SELECT c.*, p.name AS productName, p.sn AS productSn, p.image AS productImage, p.category_id AS categoryId, IFNULL(s.price, p.price) AS price, IFNULL(s.sku, '默认规格') AS sku FROM app_cart_item c LEFT JOIN app_sku_stock s ON c.sku_id = s.id LEFT JOIN app_product p ON c.product_id = p.id
